p: First, we sorted all the genes from the network by weight from high to low. Then, for a certain cancer gene set S, we traversed the sorted gene list, increasing a running-sum statistic when we encountered a gene in S and decreasing it when we encountered a gene not in S. We modified the increment and decrement value to ensure that the running sum was 0 at the end of the gene list. The enrichment scores of the five data sets are shown in Fig.Â 4.
